concept.title: Robot Framework integration with Visual Testing

conbody.p: The Robot Framework package testops-robot allows you to apply Katalon Visual Testing directly in a Robot Framework test case. The package provides you with a simple interface to upload checkpoint images and retrieve comparison results. Status of each Robot Framework test case can be promptly driven by each comparison result returned from Katalon Visual Testing
You can find the sample project for testops-robot our GitHub repository: katalon-testops-robot-sample.
This guide shows you how to configure the testops-robot package and perform visual testing with the sample project.
